event.doc_name: Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law
Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law

evidence.text: The Court finds that race was the predominant factor motivating the General Assembly’s adoption of Congressional District No. 1. [...] Consequently, Plaintiffs are entitled to judgment as a matter of law in regard to Count One of the Third Amended Complaint concerning Congressional District No. 1.
evidence.source_document: Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law

add_extracted.value: The court found race was the predominant factor in Congressional District No. 1, granting judgment to Plaintiffs on Count One of the Third Amended Complaint concerning Congressional District No. 1.

evidence.text: Plaintiffs have failed to carry their burden to prove that race was the predominant factor in the adoption of Congressional District Nos. 2 and 5. Consequently, Defendants are entitled to judgment as a matter of law regarding Count One of Plaintiffs’ Third Amended Complaint concerning Congressional District Nos. 2 and 5.
evidence.source_document: Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law

add_extracted.value: The court found race was not the predominant factor in Congressional Districts No. 2 and 5, granting judgment to Defendants on Count One of the Third Amended Complaint concerning Congressional Districts No. 2 and 5.

evidence.text: Consequently, the Court hereby enjoins the conducting of an election under Congressional District No. 1 until a constitutionally valid apportionment plan is approved by this Court.
evidence.source_document: Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law

add_extracted.value: The court issued an injunction prohibiting elections under Congressional District No. 1 until a constitutionally valid apportionment plan is approved.

args.reason: All checklist items (Court_Rulings) are fully extracted with 3 distinct values from the Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law document. No further documents need to be processed as the checklist is complete.
